amendment.description: Amendment sought to place a restriction on the location for the National Coast Guard Museum authorized in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a restriction on location regarding a museum established under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 221 (Roll no. 604).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
